summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1213, for the improvement of Jackson Street, from 4th Avenue South to 12th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by re-grading the same, under Ordinance No. 13309 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
